description: Introduces fully functional automatic background updates, critical bug fixes including configuration protection during upgrades, and enhanced update reliability.
changes: Implemented fully functional automatic background updates when enabled.
IMPORTANT: Fixed issue where config.php was overwritten during updates; your credentials and site settings are now preserved.
Added automatic update check notification to the admin dashboard.
Enhanced Upgrader class with remote manifest fetching and caching (1-hour TTL).
Implemented regex-based version updates for config.php to protect custom settings.
Fixed 500 error in upgrade manager and improved security escaping.
Added automatic OPcache reset after successful upgrades to ensure new files load immediately.
Fixed persistence of automatic update toggle setting.
